divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside and looked up and saw two bright lights in the sky and i saw one moving very slow and saw it getting farther away from the other light then the other light started moving slowly and then they started moving alittle faster and and one was behind the other then the one in front disappeared and the then about two minutes later the other one disappeared.
